World.headline: Putin in India: ‘Defence ties to deepen despite US, EU opposition’; S-500 supply uncertain
World.summary: Russian President Putin's visit to India aims to deepen defense cooperation, despite objections from the US and EU. The supply of the advanced S-500 missile system remains a point of discussion, underscoring ongoing strategic partnerships.
key_points: Putin's visit focuses on strengthening India-Russia defense ties.

World.headline: US Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) Revises Work Permit Rules: Five Years to 18 Months
World.summary: The US Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) is implementing new rules that may significantly reduce the validity period of immigrant work authorizations, potentially from five years down to 18 months. This change could have considerable implications for immigrants seeking to work in the United States, including a large Indian diaspora.
